alert.note: Alert for Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 3:28AM CST until January 11 at 9:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze with a trace of sleet and snow. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Wabasha County. In Wisconsin, Clark, Buffalo, Trempealeau and Jackson Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest impacts from this wintry mix are occurring in a narrow band of mixed precipitation that is moving northeast across southeast Minnesota and central Wisconsin. Slide offs are being reported from icy roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, visit 511mn.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
